trans-unit.source: Represents an extension of a node in the **SharePoint Connections** hierarchy of nodes in **Server Explorer**.
trans-unit.target: 表示“服务器资源管理器”的“SharePoint 连接”层次结构中的节点的扩展。

trans-unit.source: Implement this interface to extend an existing type of node.
trans-unit.target: 实现此接口来扩展现有类型的节点。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Extend a SharePoint Node in Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-extend-a-sharepoint-node-in-server-explorer.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 扩展服务器资源管理器中的 SharePoint 节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-extend-a-sharepoint-node-in-server-explorer.md)。

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement this interface must include the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.ExplorerNodeTypeAttribute> to be discovered by Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 实现此接口的类必须包括<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.ExplorerNodeTypeAttribute>发现由 Visual Studio。

trans-unit.source: Added new remarks with links to topics that show how to implement this interface
trans-unit.target: 添加了新注释以链接到演示如何实现此接口的主题

trans-unit.source: The node type that is being extended.
You can handle events of the `nodeType` parameter to add features to the node.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理的事件`nodeType`参数将功能添加到节点。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can handle the following events:
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以处理以下事件：

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeEvents.NodeChildrenRequested>: Handle this event to add new child nodes to the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeEvents.NodeChildrenRequested>： 处理此事件以将新的子节点添加到节点。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add a Custom SharePoint Node to Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 向服务器资源管理器中添加自定义 SharePoint 节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeEvents.NodeMenuItemsRequested>: Handle this event to add a custom shortcut menu item to the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeEvents.NodeMenuItemsRequested>： 处理此事件以将自定义的快捷菜单项添加到节点。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeEvents.NodePropertiesRequested>: Handle this event to add custom properties to the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeEvents.NodePropertiesRequested>： 处理此事件以将自定义属性添加到节点。

trans-unit.source: The properties appear in the **Properties** window when the node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 属性将显示在**属性**窗口时选择的节点。

trans-unit.source: This method is called once for each <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeTypeExtension> implementation.
